w:r.w:t: For the demo, we can establish a connection using our cluster in Texas. There are two potential connection methods: direct connection if the Visium platform uses a public IP, or an IPSec VPN for full connectivity. From our end, we will push the necessary information to Visium. Please let me know which scenario you prefer. If a VPN is needed, I will provide the common parameters for setup.
